meanings.definition: A person or thing that carries or transports something.
meanings.sent1: The carriers of groceries helped bring the bags inside.
meanings.sent2: The mail carriers deliver letters and packages to our homes.
meanings.sent3: The carriers of the heavy boxes struggled to keep them balanced.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a carrier of joy that brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The ants were efficient carriers of food to their nest.

meanings.definition: A company that provides transportation services.
meanings.sent1: The local carriers offer reliable shipping services.
meanings.sent2: The carriers have a fleet of trucks for transporting goods.
meanings.sent3: The carriers organized a fun team-building trip for their employees.
meanings.sent4: The carriers paved the way for faster and more efficient deliveries.
meanings.sent5: The carriers expanded their routes to reach more customers.

meanings.definition: A substance that carries a disease or genetic trait.
meanings.sent1: Mosquitoes can be carriers of malaria and other illnesses.
meanings.sent2: The carriers of the virus unknowingly spread it to others.
meanings.sent3: The carriers of the genetic mutation were identified through testing.
meanings.sent4: The polluted water acted as a carrier of harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The carriers of the gene passed it down through generations.
